articles.author: Lexi Carson
articles.title: Taylor Swift Stops Mid-Song to Help a Fan in Distress at Edinburgh Eras Tour Show - Variety
articles.description: Taylor Swift stopped her concert in Edinburgh, Scotland, on Friday to help a fan in distress.
articles.content:
Taylor Swift stopped her concert in Edinburgh, Scotland, on Friday to help a fan. 
Swift was in the middle of singing her “Midnights” song “Would’ve Could’ve Should’ve” when she noticed a fan who wa… [+1978 chars]
